IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HOUSING AND NEIGHBORHOOD DEVELOPMENT SERVICE (HANDS) MAKES STRONGER AND MORE VIBRANT NEIGHBORHOODS IN PARTNERSHIP WITH THE COMMUNITIES IT SERVES THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT AND MANAGEMENT OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HANDS IS COMMITTED TO MAKING STRONGER AND MORE VIBRANT NEIGHBORHOODS IN PARTNERSHIP WITH THE COMMUNITIES IT SERVES THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT AND MANAGEMENT OF QUALITY AFFORDABLE HOUSING. IN ADDITION TO THE NEW CONSTRUCTION OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING, HANDS HAS A TRADITION OF SELECTING THE IDEAL BUILDINGS TO REHABILITATE, CREATING UNIQUE LIVING ENVIRONMENTS WHILE KEEPING THE MONTHLY COST AFFORDABLE FOR OUR RESIDENTS.HANDS IS COMMITTED TO SERVING MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY INCLUDING THOSE INDIVIDUALS LIVING WITH DISABILITIES, SENIOR CITIZENS AND FAMILIES OR INDIVIDUALS WHO CAN BENEFIT FROM THE ASSISTANCE OF QUALITY AFFORDABLE HOUSING.
IRS990.Desc: HANDS IS THE LARGEST NON-PROFIT PROVIDER OF HIGH QUALITY AFFORDABLE HOUSING IN NORTHWESTERN PENNSYLVANIA AND CURRENTLY OVERSEES 959 APARTMENT HOMES IN FIVE COUNTIES. FOR OVER 50 YEARS, HANDS HAS SUCCESSFULLY DEVELOPED MORE THAN 1,033 UNITS OF AFFORDABLE RENTAL HOUSING IN 9 COUNTIES ACROSS PENNSYVLANIA. IT'S DEVELOPMENTS ARE AMONG THE BEST DESIGNED AND CONSTRUCTED RENTAL COMMUNITIES IN PENNSYLVANIA. ADDITIONALLY, HANDS DEVELOPS AND BUILDS SINGLE FAMILIY HOMES FOR MODERATE INCOME FAMILIES WHO ARE OFTEN FIRST TIME HOME BUYERS. OVER THE PAST SEVERAL YEARS, HANDS HAS ASSISTED 102 FIRST TIME HOME BUYERS THROUGH AN ACQUISITION/REHABILITATION PROGRAM AND ANOTHER 13 HOMEBUYERS THOURGH A NEW CONSTRUCTION PROGRAM. THE COORDINATION OF SUPPORT SERVICE IS PROVIDED TO HOME BUYERS AND RENTERS TO BETTER ASSURE AN ENRICHED AND LONG TERM LIVING EXPERIENCE IN HANDS SPONSORED HOUSING COMMUNITIES. IN 2017, HANDS WAS INVOLVED IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF A NEW RENTAL PROPERTY; MIDTOWN #6. THIS NEW PROJECT IS BEING DEVELOPED FOR THE BENEFIT OF LOW INCOME FAMILIES AND IS LOCATED IN ERIE, PENNSYLVANIA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LIABILITIES ASSOCIATED WITH SECURITY AND OTHER DEPOSITS THAT ARE HELD IN TRUST ON BEHALF OF RENTAL TENANTS.
A PLAN OF INTENDED USE HAS NOT YET BEEN ESTABLISHED.

FORM 990, PART IV, LINE 11 F, THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AS A CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION WHEREBY ONLY UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME, AS DEFINED BY SECTION 509(A)(1) OF THE CODE, IS SUBJECT TO FEDERAL INCOME TAX. THE ORGANIZATION HAD UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME RESULTING FROM THE LEASING OF A PORTION OF ITS OFFICE BUILDING FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2018. ACTIVITY FROM 7E7, LLC AND MID-TOWN HOMES, L.P., WHOLLY-OWNED ENTITIES OF THE ORGANIZATION, ARE SUBJECT TO THE APPLICABLE TAXES ON ACTIVITIES THAT WOULD FALL OUTSIDE OF THE EXEMPT PURPOSE OF THE ORGANIZATION. INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO INCOME TAX REPORTING WOULD BE RECOGNIZED IF INCURRED AND WOULD BE INCLUDED AS AN EXPENSE IN THE CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF ACTIVITIES. THE ORGANIZATION'S RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO AUDIT BY VARIOUS TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE OPEN AUDIT PERIODS FOR THE ORGANIZATION ARE 2015, 2016, 2017, AND 2018. THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS THE TOPIC OF INCOME TAXES FROM THE FASB ASC WITH REGARD TO THE ACCOUNTING AND RECOGNITION OF INCOME TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX RETURNS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS PROVIDED A COMPLETE COPY OF THIS FORM 990 TO ALL MEMBERS OF ITS GOVERNING BODY FOR REVIEW BEFORE FILING THE FORM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL EMPLOYEES ARE GIVEN THE ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT WHERE THEY DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS THEY MAY HAVE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE SALARY OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO OF THE ORGANZIATION ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII CONTACT ADDRESSES FOR OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, ETC
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CANDACE BATTLES - 7 EAST 7TH ST, ERIE, PA 16501. MARY KWIATKOWSKI - 7 EAST 7TH ST, ERIE, PA 16501. SISTER MICHELE HEALY - 7 EAST 7TH ST, ERIE, PA 16501. WILLIAM STEGER - 7 EAST 7TH ST, ERIE, PA 16501. MATTHEW ZONNO - 7 EAST 7TH ST, ERIE, PA 16501.
THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
